thread.title: Steel Tariff Blues in Red State America

author: The Editorial Board
title: Steel Tariff Blues in Red State America
text:
President Trump’s new 25% tariff on steel isn’t formally in effect until March 23, but the steel industry is wasting no time exploiting the political favoritism to raise prices on its American customers.
On Monday the Metalworking Group of Cincinnati received notice of a 35% increase for American-made cold-rolled carbon steel. Owner Mike Schmitt sent up an SOS on Twitter: “This is a shock. It is unnecessary to be punished by our own government. @realDonaldTrump @senrobportman @RepBradWenstrup. And, yes, this is USA steel not... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
